title: Loading times
body:
Anyone else noticed a spate of games loading super fast? Normally I've got time to go make toast or whatever but these days I barely get the bread in the toaster before I hear "minions have spawned"
{{summoner:6}}

replies.body: Fast internet and a good computer issues :(
I think i might down grade my pc and get dial up. I need some toast.
Yeah man I have NBN and about to spend 4K on a PC, not looking good for my coffee breaks :(
Yea true that! I didn't really realise until you said but yea most of the time they do load faster than I have time to do anything .. first world problems ...
